Reviews.Title: Not very good signal
Reviews.Author: Cristina O.
Reviews.Content: I like a lot, is my first window phone, so somethings are new for me, is easy to use but it looses the signal every time it has a chance, even in open spaces, i have to turn it off and back on to regain the signal.

Reviews.Title: At&t; phone, not factory unlocked!
Reviews.Author: shalman
Reviews.Content: the phone is nice and new, but in the product description it was mentioned that phone is factory unlocked.  When it arrived i found out that it has At&t; symbols and apps on it,  which i din't like.  Overall Good job and good support form BREED.  only reason i am giving a 3 star because of hiding the information in the description, else i would've given a 5.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding product
Reviews.Author: spiralni
Reviews.Content: As expected from nokia. A very good designed product, it is elegant and fast just with one little problem,  it is a little heavy cellphone.

brand new Nokia Lumia 900
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
